"Xiemmy": "Xitrae"
"Ah... You've arrived. I'll introduce myself again."
"I am Xiemmy. I work in the technological department, and I'm in charge of equipment development..."
"I am currently giving out advice to ARKS on how to strengthen equipment."

"Ah... You've arrived. Thank you very much."
"...I knew I'd be able to ask you for help, <%me>..."
"...Well, moving on to why I called you here..."
"Some people don't do much to strengthen their gear..."

"I'd be happy if more people were interested in it..."
"F-First, let's start with a method for gathering the funds you'll need."
"Grinding your equipment is quite expensive, after all..."
"So go and look for Alpha Reactors... please."
"I think... you can find them outside the City, just laying about in the field. They look like shiny golden power cores."
"W-Well, um... Good luck!"
"Ah, welcome... back."
"...Um, sorry if it... feels like I've been sending you around like an errand runner..."
"I think... that should be all of the things you'll need... for Grinding your equipment."

"Though if I had to say, the equipments themselves are more my area of expertise..."
"It'd take too long to explain all the particulars of ARKS equipment, though. Another time..."
"And that... was my little lecture on strengthening equipment."
"Xiemmy, how's it going?"
"Xitrae?"
"Sorry you had to cover for me like this. We're pretty shortstaffed today, so they needed me here."
"No, I... I don't mind."
"Alright. Thanks, you're a gem."
"...Hey, wait. Isn't that the new ARKS member folks've been talking about?"
"So, have you strengthened any of your equipment with Xiemmy's advice?"
"Ah, no, not yet... We're actually just finishing up now..."
"Oh, hmm. Alright then."
"Oh, yeah! If you're up for it, can I ask a favor of you as well?"
"You can do it after you get your equipment all sorted out. I'll send you the request details!"
"There's no rush, just do it whenever you've got the time. Thanks! Seeya!"
"...Xitrae? Hello? ...F-Free spirited as always, I see..."
"...She's the one who asked me to take care of this job for her."
"If it's not too much trouble, please help her with the request she sent you."
"Thanks, and... Take care."
